article.name: Cluedo People
article.description:
This iconic image was drawn up for some kinda presentation thing I was doing... I needed some generic people pictures, and went with Microsoft\'s gradient coloured faceless style.
I\'ve done a slightly improved version of this with shaded hair too, gels each person together better. The shape of the hair was important to give the faces direction.
article.keywords: cluedo, people, microsoft, colours, faces, gradients, icons, iconic, vector, shading
